title: My Missing Piece
description: Once a heart is broken into a million pieces can it be put back together? Cambridge left home as a teenager and made the life she had always dreamed up...the dream of a happy home for her and her daughter. Her dream never included love, but when it finds her she must decide if she will let it in or walk away. Xander had let his dream of love go...focused only on the success of his company. When Cambridge sparks hope that he can love again he must decide to pursue it against his better judgement or let it go.  But will the secrets of their pasts keep them apart?
author: Tracy Lynn Caldwell
